subsections.description: This page contains a form that can be used to create a new team. When the form is submitted, the data is sent to `/teams/newteam` via POST.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name of the new team.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The id of the new team.

parameters.name: score
parameters.description: The initial score of the new team.

steps: Loads parameters from the request body
Checks for conflicting teams (teams with the same `id` as the new team)
If there are no conflicting teams, then attempts to add the new team to the database
Checks to see if the new team was added
If the team was added, sends 201 response

subsections.description: This path instructs the server to create a new team with the given parameters. If the instruction is successful, then the new team is added to the scoreboard and all client displays the scoreboard are instructed to refresh.

responses.content: `A team with the identifier {id} already exists`
responses.context: The new team conflicted with an already existing team.

responses.content: `One or more required parameters are missing.`
responses.context: A required parameter was not sent as part of the message body.
One of the following validation criteria was not met:
The server attempted to create the team but was unsuccessful.
A fatal error occurred when attempting to create the team.
